content.query:
CREATE SCHEMA [ETL]
GO
CREATE SCHEMA [PII]
GO


CREATE TABLE [ETL].[maxes]
( 
	[ID] [int]  NULL,
	[ID_2] [varchar](2)  NULL,
	[max_gv] [datetime2](7)  NULL,
	[min_gv] [datetime2](7)  NULL,
	[gv_interval] [int]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [ID] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [ETL].[mins]
( 
	[ID] [int]  NULL,
	[ID_2] [varchar](2)  NULL,
	[max_gv] [datetime2](7)  NULL,
	[min_gv] [datetime2](7)  NULL,
	[gv_interval] [int]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [ID] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[dept_duser]
( 
	[Id] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[Dept] [varchar](100)  NOT NULL,
	[DUser] [varchar](100)  NOT NULL,
	[ERole] [varchar](100)  NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[SomePIIDDM]
( 
	[Id] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[FirstName] [varchar](50)  NOT NULL,
	[MiddleName] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[LastName] [varchar](50)  NOT NULL,
	[Email] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[Address1] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Address2] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[PostCode] [varchar](10)  NULL,
	[DateOfBirth] [date]  NOT NULL,
	[Salary] [int]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [PII].[SomePIIDDM]
( 
	[Id] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[FirstName] [varchar](50)  NOT NULL,
	[MiddleName] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[LastName] [varchar](50)  NOT NULL,
	[Email] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[Address1] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Address2] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[PostCode] [varchar](10)  NULL,
	[DateOfBirth] [date]  NOT NULL,
	[Salary] [int]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
